Html: I tried posting a comment on a site using Oxite and my email contains an underscore.  It didn't allow me to post.
Thanks for letting us know.  We'll fix up the regular expression used to validate email addresses before the next release.

Actually, Nathan just checked and this has already been fixed (quite a while ago actually), but since we haven't done a release in quite a while, it hasn't gotten out to everyone yet.  It will be fixed in the next release (since the fix is already checked in).
It was actually on your site Erik where I was trying it.  Maybe you haven't loaded the latest bits on your blog.
Correct, I haven't.  Sorry about that!  We're still working on an upgrade script for the database so I can run the latest bits.
